com.defano.jmonet.tools

Class FreeformShapeTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.BasicTool<PathToolDelegate>
      • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.PathTool
        • com.defano.jmonet.tools.FreeformShapeTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SurfaceInteractionObserver, PathToolDelegate, Tool, KeyListener, EventListener

    public class FreeformShapeTool
extends PathTool
implements PathToolDelegate
    Tool allowing user to draw a free-form path (like a paintbrush) that is closed upon completion and can thusly be filled with paint.

    • Method Summary

      void startPath(Scratch scratch, Stroke stroke, Paint strokePaint, Point initialPoint)
      Begins drawing a path on the given graphics context.

                      Stroke stroke,
                      Paint strokePaint,
                      Point initialPoint)
        Begins drawing a path on the given graphics context.
        Specified by:
        startPath in interface PathToolDelegate
        Parameters:
        scratch - The scratch buffer on which to draw.
        stroke - The stroke with which to draw
        strokePaint - The paint with which to draw
        initialPoint - The first point defined on the path

      • addPoint

        public void addPoint(Scratch scratch,
                     Stroke stroke,
                     Paint strokePaint,
                     Point lastPoint,
                     Point thisPoint)
        Adds a point to the path begun via a call to PathToolDelegate.startPath(Scratch, Stroke, Paint, Point).
        Specified by:
        addPoint in interface PathToolDelegate
        Parameters:
        scratch - The scratch buffer on which to draw.
        stroke - The stroke with which to draw
        strokePaint - The paint with which to draw
        lastPoint - The last point added to the current path
        thisPoint - The new point to add to the current path

      • completePath

        public void completePath(Scratch scratch,
                         Stroke stroke,
                         Paint strokePaint,
                         Paint fillPaint)
        Completes the path begun via a call to PathToolDelegate.startPath(Scratch, Stroke, Paint, Point).
        Specified by:
        completePath in interface PathToolDelegate
        Parameters:
        scratch - The scratch buffer on which to draw.
        stroke - The stroke with which to draw
        strokePaint - The paint with which to render the stroke
        fillPaint - The paint with which to fill the shape, null to indicate shape should not be filled
